itemDescription: Scottish physician, chemist, mineralogist, meteorologist, zoologist and scholar

wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Stewart Traill  (29 October 1781 – 30 July 1862) was a British physician, chemist, meteorologist, zoologist and scholar of medical jurisprudence. He was the grandfather of the physicist, meteorologist and geologist Robert Traill Omond FRSE (1858-1914).
